name: Fancy Trash
description:
It has come to our attention that the humans have been storing the finest trash in the world in a high security prison known as an "art gallery". You are going to infiltrate this "art gallery" and claim the trash for raccoon kind. Drop down, grab the Fancy Trash and steal as much of it as you can without getting caught!

Credits
  • Del Nordlund
  • Donovan Jonk
  • Robert Hunter
  • Sebastian Scaini
